key.name: print-multiple-sudoku-difficulty
key.summary: Difficulty level of sudokus to be printed
key.description: Set the difficulty level of the sudokus you want to print. Possible values are: "easy", "medium", "hard", "very_hard"

key.name: print-multiple-sudokus-to-print
key.description: Set the number of sudokus you want to print

key.name: print-multiple-sudokus-to-print-per-page
key.summary: Number of Sudokus to print per page
key.description: Set the number of sudokus you want to print per page

key.name: show-warnings
key.summary: Warn about unfillable squares and duplicate numbers
key.description: Displays a big red X in a square if it cannot possibly be filled by any number and duplicate numbers are highlighted in red

key.name: show-extra-warnings
key.summary: Additionally warn when correct solution is violated or not earmarked
key.description: Changes the background color of a square to red if the value does not match puzzle solution, or if no earmark matches the puzzle solution

key.name: highlighter
key.summary: Highlight row, column and square that contain the selected cell

key.name: window-width
key.summary: Width of the window in pixels

key.name: window-height
key.summary: Height of the window in pixels

key.name: window-is-maximized
key.summary: true if the window is maximized

key.name: initialize-earmarks
key.summary: Initialize the earmarks with the possible values for each cell
